uploader.title: Upload Files
uploader.description: Upload one or more files by clicking or dragging and dropping them

rules.heading: As a reminder of the guidelines...
rules.rule_two: All characters must be of legal age
rules.rule_three: You own the rights to the content you upload
rules.hint: Upstanding netizens shall read all the rules before posting

query.error: There was an error creating a draft post

body.start: Are you sure you'd like to exit the post creator? You can resume your progress from your

uploader.title: Posting {{count}} Media
uploader.description: Add, arrange, or remove the files you're uploading.
uploader.upload_limit: You can only upload a maximum of {{count}} files

error.message: There was an error processing your files

uploader.error: There was an error processing your files

arranger.empty: You'll need to upload at least one file before you can continue

query.error: There was an error saving the post content

selector.title: Who is the target audience?
selector.description: The audience is the group of people that you intended this post for. This will determine whether or not a user can see your post based on their set preferences.

query.error: There was an error saving the post audience

selector.required_prompt: Selecting an audience allows us to filter out content that someone would otherwise not prefer to see. We only show a person content they are interested in.

selector.title: What is the brand?
selector.description: A brand is the artist or group of artists that created the content that belongs to the post.

query.error: There was an error saving the post brand

brand.required_prompt: Brands are an easy way to manage your content and allow you to have a unique link that can be shared anywhere.

selector.title: Add some categories
selector.description: Select the categories that would be most applicable to the content you have uploaded.

search.empty: No categories were found with the title '{{word}}'

query.error: There was an error saving the post categories

selector.title: What are the characters?
selector.description: Select the character(s) that are the primary focus in your content.

search.placeholder: Search for a character by name
search.empty: No characters were found with the name '{{word}}'

query.error: There was an error saving the post characters

body.title: Review your selections
body.description: Make sure you like what you see before you submit.

query.error: There was an error submitting the post

in_review.title: Your post has been submitted for review
in_review.description: The post will be reviewed to ensure it falls within our community guidelines. Once approved, it will be visible to the public.

not_in_review.title: Your post has been submitted
not_in_review.description: The post is now visible to the public

drafts.description: Click on a draft post to continue editing it.

review.description: These posts will be reviewed to ensure they comply with our community guidelines before going live.

empty.title: No Posts in Review
empty.description: When you submit a post, it'll appear here if it needs to be reviewed.

published.description: Click on a published post to see it live.

rejected.description: These posts were rejected from being visible to the public for violating the community guidelines.

empty.title: No Rejected Posts
empty.description: If one of your posts is rejected
